name: Sketchy Buddy
description:
Two students trying to talk through notes in class

This game is 2D Platformer meets Mad Libs. You and your friend incorporate two doodles that have to jump around self-contained levels and find the words that fit into the mailbox, which is the note they share.

Controls:

Player 1 - WASD to move and E to grab.

Player 2 - Arrow Keys to move and Right Shift to grab.

Team (Mikey Boy):
